original_title: ‘Daddy’ Trump and Western Europe’s oath of allegiance — RT World News
article_summary: ICE deletes posts about deporting Ukrainians during Zelensky's visit to Washington, as part of Trump's immigration crackdown. The posts, containing photos of deportees, were removed before a potential meeting between Zelensky and Putin, with Lavrov stating that Putin is ready to meet Zelensky once all issues related to the conflict are worked out.</s>
